metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43305 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in Clickhouse's LZ4 compression codec when parsing a malicious query. There is no verification that the copy operations in the LZ4::decompressImpl loop and especially the arbitrary copy operation wildCopy<copy_amount>(op, ip, copy_end), don’t exceed the destination buffer’s limits. This issue is very similar to CVE-2021-43304, but the vulnerable copy operation is in a different wildCopy call.

criterions.comment: clickhouse package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
